education.name: create_educations
education.description: Create a list of formal educational achievements, like college and university, as well as certified online educations, like MOOCs (if applicable).

university.description: Name of the university or college.

start_year.description: Year of start of the education, e.g. '2004'.

start_month.description: Month of start of the education, e.g. 'January'.

end_year.description: Year of conclusion of the education, e.g. '2008'.

end_month.description: Month of conclusion of the education, e.g. 'January'.

country.description: Country where the university is located, e.g. 'Sweden'.

city.description: City where the university is located, e.g. 'Lund'.

description.description: Free text description of the education.'

platform.description: Name of the platform where the MOOC was taken, e.g. 'Coursera'.

educator.description: Name of the educator or institution offering the MOOC, e.g. 'Johns Hopkins University'.

course.description: Name of the MOOC course, e.g. 'Data Science Specialization'.

end_year.description: Year of conclusion of the MOOC, e.g. '2022'.

end_month.description: Month of conclusion of the MOOC, e.g. 'August'.

url_certificate.description: URL to the certificate of completion of the MOOC, e.g. 'https://coursera.org/share/certificate/data-science-specialization'.

grade.description: Grade or score achieved in the MOOC, e.g. '95%'.

description.description: Free text description of the MOOC.'

employment.name: create_employments
employment.description: Create a list of past and present employments, their time span as well as description of what the work entailed.

title.description: Title of the position at the employer.

start_year.description: Year of start of the employment, e.g. '2008'.

start_month.description: Month of start of the employment, e.g. 'April'.

end_year.description: Year of conclusion of the employment (if applicable), e.g. '2008'.

end_month.description: Month of conclusion of the employment (if applicable), e.g. 'June'.

location.description: Location of the employer, e.g. 'Linkoping, Sweden'.

description.description: Free text description of the employment.'

skills.name: create_skills
skills.description: Create a list of skills, and optionally their proficiency level and a description of how they were acquired.

name.description: Name of the skill, e.g. 'Python', 'Molecular Physics', 'Project Management', 'Conflict Resolution'.

level.description: Level of proficiency in the skill, e.g. 'Expert', 'Intermediate', 'Beginner'.

description.description: Free text description of the skill, how it was acquired, associated certification etc.'

biography.name: create_biography
biography.description: Create biographical data of the person, including contact information, links to social media profiles, and a free text description of the person.

about_me.description: Free text description of the person, akin to a section like 'about me' or 'career objetive' or 'mission statement', e.g. 'In pursuit of excellence in computational chemistry, over ten years of proven scientific team leadership.'

linkedin_url.description: URL to the LinkedIn profile of the person.

github_url.description: URL to the GitHub profile of the person.

blog_url.description: URL to the personal blog of the person.
